resources.string: \"Island\" is a sandbox environment to clone selected apps and isolate them from accessing your personal data outside (including call logs, contacts and etc) even if permissions are granted.\n\nCloned app runs parallel aside from the installed one with its separate copy of app data. It can also be frozen on demand, with launcher icon vanished and its background behaviors completely blocked.

Android for Work is already set up on your device by \"%1$s\". Due to the limitation of Android system, Island cannot coexist with it. If you proceed, the existent profile WITH ALL ITS DATA WILL BE REMOVED.
If anything goes wrong during the setup procedure, you can always remove all the data created by Island via \"Settings - Account - Remove work profile\".

Sorry, your device (or ROM) is incompatible with Island.

> %s

Please refer to the online FAQ for possible solutions.
No apps here.\nPlease switch to other view.
Sorry, your device or ROM does not support \"Managed Profile\" feature, which is required by Island.

DEVICE ENCRYPTION is required on your device to create the island, enforced by Android system. Encrypting the device may degrade the overall performance on some low-end devices. Encryption can be skipped if root privilege is available and granted in the next step.\n\nFor advanced user: The encryption can also be skipped by manual override via ADB shell. Please refer to the online guide.

Island will now launch the Android installer to \"install\" this app in Island.\n\nAlthough it looks like the regular installation confirmation, actually it takes no extra storage space but just activates this app in Island. Thus the \"installation\" will finish instantly.

Island will now launch Google Play Store to clone this app, please then click the \"Install\" button there.\n\nAlthough it will look like the regular installation, actually it will not download the app again and takes no extra storage space but just activates this app in Island. Thus the \"installation\" will finish instantly.

Island will now launch the built-in app store on your device to clone this app, please follow the regular installation procedure.\n\nATTENTION: The built-in app store on your device may or may not support Android for Work properly. In case it fails to finish the installation, please refer to the FAQ for solutions.
Sorry, Island cannot clone apps without a proper built-in app market on your device (preferable Google Play Store) until Android 5.1. Please refer to the FAQ for solutions.

To save memory and avoid unnecessary battery consumption, Island has no background services in design. Instead it delegates the automatic freezing job to Greenify, taking advantage of its sophisticated automatic hibernation management.
Greenify needs to be upgraded to a newer version to support Island.
Island was accidentally deactivated, please grant this manual Device Admin request to re-activate.
Are you sure you want to destroy the whole Island? You will LOSE ALL THE DATA IN ISLAND.\n\nDon\'t worry, apps and data outside Island will NEVER be affected.

Since exclusively installed in Island, the following %1$d app(s) will be UNINSTALLED effectively from your device if Island is destroyed.

%2$s

Are you sure you want to proceed?
Are you sure to deactivate Island?\n\nYou have to go through the setup flow again to bring it back.
To remove the whole Island space, please open system \"Settings - Accounts\" and select \"Remove work profile\".
Add a shortcut to de-freeze and launch %1$s?
Greenify is not supported to run in Island.\n\nIf you want Greenify to freeze app automatically, please use the \"Auto-freeze with Greenify\" action on selected app.

System app can only be disabled. It\'s similar to the removal of an installed app.\n\nIsland has no privilege to do that, instead you will be redirected to the system settings app, there you can click the \"DISABLE\" button to proceed.
Setup is complete, please wait for the Island to start.
Sorry, an internal error occurred, please restart this app and try again.
